title: Can you offer advice for this problem?
body:
Hi, and thanks in advance for helping...

AFter the game ends the screen to honor a teammate pops up. It used to pop up immediately for me, but recently its been taking 30-45 seconds to pop up. What could be causing this and how do I fix it?

BTW, I uninstalled and reinstalled already, but that didnt fix it.

replies.body: The client can take awhile to show the honor screen if you have the option "close client during game" turned on. Check for that really quick, and turn if off if it's on, and let me know if it opens up faster for ya.
